name: ZooRescue
0:
”Alexa, open zoo rescue”
”Alexa, start zoo rescue”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zoo rescue
des: Play an interesting game of quiz with Alexa where each correct answer saves an animal from lion. Each question contains interesting facts about the animals. So, Be a saviour of animal. While playing the quiz, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next question. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the quiz.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
